channel.title: [PI] Ring of Charos(a) TAKEOVER AHH [PI]
channel.description:
Source: Soul Split - based off PI
Problem: A player obtained "ring of charos(a)" which is NOT in my item.cfg. The rings bonuses were 30k+... I searched for the ring and bonuses and it did not exist anywhere.
Question1: How can I disable or delete the ring and bonuses from my server?
Question2: How did the player get the ring that is nowhere in my files?
-thanks Grant
